DOC.brief_title: A Trial Comparing Two Approaches Weight Loss
DOC.detailed_description: Weight loss program evidence considerable variability treatment outcome weight regain common , signal need refinement effective treatment . This study compare recently develop Transforming Your Life ( TYL ) program Diabetes Prevention Program ( DPP ) , consider `` Gold Standard '' behavioral weight loss treatment .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1. overweight/obese ( body mass index > 27 kg/m2 ) 2. free serious medical condition would complicate participation intervention via adherence mobility ( e.g. , serious heart disease musculoskeletal problem would interfere moderate exercise ) 3. undergone bariatric surgery 4. able provide medical clearance physician . Exclusion Criteria 1. evidence medical condition would complicate participation intervention via adherence mobility ( e.g. , serious heart disease musculoskeletal problem would interfere moderate exercise ) 2. undergone bariatric surgery ,
